sqlMap.update: update tbl_person set first_name = #firstName#, last_name = #lastName#, student_number = #studentNumber#, hpr_number = #hprNumber#, contact_information_id = #contactInformation.id#, profile_id = #profile.id#, employer = #employer#, position_text = #positionText#, position_type_id = #position.id#, is_student = #isStudent#, last_changed = now() where person_id = #id# and last_changed = #lastChanged#;
sqlMap.delete: delete from tbl_person where person_id = #id# and last_changed = #lastChanged#;
sqlMap.select: select person_id, first_name, last_name, student_number, hpr_number, contact_information_id, profile_id, position_type_id, employer, position_text, is_student, last_changed from tbl_person where person_id = #id#;

select person_id, first_name, last_name, student_number, hpr_number, contact_information_id, profile_id, position_type_id, employer, position_text, is_student, last_changed from tbl_person where person_id = (select person_id from tbl_user where user_id = #userId#);

select person_id, first_name, last_name, student_number, hpr_number, contact_information_id, profile_id, position_type_id, employer, position_text, is_student, last_changed from tbl_person where person_id = (select person_id from tbl_org_unit where org_unit_id = #id#);
